edu.asu.ying.mapreduce.rpc.channels.kad

Class KadReceiveTransportSink

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.asu.ying.mapreduce.rpc.channels.kad.KadReceiveTransportSink
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ChannelTransportSink, ReceiveChannelTransportSink, Observable, il.technion.ewolf.kbr.MessageHandler

    public final class KadReceiveTransportSink
extends java.lang.Object
implements il.technion.ewolf.kbr.MessageHandler, ReceiveChannelTransportSink
    Listens to the Kademlia network for messages destined for this node and passes them to a ReceiveChannelSink chain.

    Exposes the following properties via getExposedProps():

    • local-endpoint - the protocol, IP address, port, and Kademlia key of the listening/sending node.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      KadReceiveTransportSink(MessageSink requestSink, MessageSink responseSink)
      Initialize the local node, but don't attempt to join any network (server-only mode).
      KadReceiveTransportSink(MessageSink requestSink, MessageSink responseSink, java.net.URI remoteNodeAddress)
      Initialize the local node and attempt to join an existing network.
